summary: Motivated professional with experience in solution delivery and project coordination.
Comfortable working in small teams and supporting cross-functional collaboration.
Focused on steady improvement, but with room to grow in leadership and impact.
technicalSkills: Web Development – basic experience with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase.
Familiarity with API integration and simple automation workflows.
Exposure to SQL databases and cloud deployment pipelines.

customModules.title: Small Demo Project – Team Collaboration Tool
content: Built a simple web tool to help a study group track tasks and deadlines.
Focused on practicing teamwork and version control with GitHub.

customModules.title: Capstone Project – Course Scheduling App
content: Developed a basic scheduling application as a university capstone project.
Learned fundamentals of frontend design and database connections.

templates.title: Solution Manager
content: Worked with a small client team to adapt an existing software solution, focusing on minor customization rather than full-scale delivery.
Participated in solution design sessions but mainly supported documentation and testing activities.
Assisted senior colleagues in preparing slide decks and basic proposals for internal reviews.

templates.title: Project Manager
content: Coordinated schedules for a student-led project, ensuring weekly tasks were tracked though deadlines sometimes slipped.
Handled communication between two small groups, but had limited decision-making authority.
Helped write meeting notes and basic project updates for supervisors.

templates.title: Technical Account Manager
content: Responded to basic technical questions from users, escalating complex issues to senior engineers.
Supported account updates by drafting draft responses and maintaining spreadsheets of client data.
Shadowed experienced account managers to learn about handling client escalations.
